actions.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 257 (Roll no. 194).

description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Office of Civil Rights and Civil Liberties by $3.346 million and to reduce funding for the U.S. Customs Border Protection Automation Modernization account by $4 million.
purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Office for Civil Rights and Civil Liberties by $3,346,000 and reduces funds for the U.S. Customs Border Protection Automation Modernization account by $4 million.
